resources.string: 📚 As quiet as a library, the world seems to be holding its breath.
🛏 Soft whispers, like a lullaby murmured in your ear.
☕ Casual conversations, akin to the background music in a café, warm and pleasant.
🏠 Sounds of daily life, like the small noises at home, warm and peaceful.
🚗 The hustle and bustle of the city, the sound of cars driving, busy yet vibrant.
⚠️ The current volume is too loud and may harm your hearing. Please avoid prolonged exposure to this environment!

对AudioRecorder的封装 实现:
 1.获得原始pcm数据后，计算出分贝参考值
 2.通过分贝值展示一个动画
 3.通过MediaCodec编码成aac或者是Lame编码成mp3 https://juejin.cn/post/7473167460263624716#!
